value.documentation: Provides commands for managing dcli profiles
value.name: env.profiles

params.documentation:
Profile ID to set as default.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

output.documentation:
id of the current default profile
The result will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.

params.documentation:
Profile name of profile to remove from configuration.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: name

params.documentation:
Profile to copy configuration from.
origin Profile to copy current settings from. If unset, creates an empty profile.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: origin_profile

params.documentation:
ID of the profile to get.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

output.documentation:
the names of available profiles
The result will contain identifiers for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.

value.name: list

params.documentation:
Profile to delete from configuration
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

value.documentation: Provides commands for managing dcli profiles
value.name: env.profiles

value.documentation: Adds default option to be used for dcli commands
value.name: set

params.documentation:
Parameter name of the command.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.command.option.
params.name: option

params.documentation:
Module to add default option to.
If unset, adds to default module.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.module.
params.name: module

params.documentation:
Server to add default option to.
If unset, adds to default options of default server.
params.name: server

params.documentation:
Profile to be added to.
If unset, sets option to default profile.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

value.documentation: Gets default option value for a specified option parameter name.
value.name: get

params.documentation:
Parameter name to get value for.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.command.option.
params.name: option

params.documentation:
Module to get default option from.
If unset, gets from default module.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.module.
params.name: module

params.documentation:
Server to get default option from.
If unset, reads from default server.
params.name: server

params.documentation:
Profile to be read from.
If unset, uses default profile.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

value.documentation: Listing all specified default options for default or all profiles
value.name: list

params.documentation:
flag to determine whether to list the options of default or all profiles.
If unset, returns default options for default profile.
params.name: all_profiles

value.documentation: Deletes default option for a specified module and option parameter name.
value.name: delete

params.documentation:
Parameter name to remove.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.command.option.
params.name: option

params.documentation:
Module to delete default option from.
If unset, removes from default module.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.module.
params.name: module

params.documentation:
Server to delete default option from.
If unset, removes from default options of default server.
params.name: server

params.documentation:
Profile to be deleted from.
If unset, uses default profile.
The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vapi.clients.dcli.profile.
params.name: profile

value.documentation: Provides commands for managing dcli command's default options
value.name: env.options
